newsitem.title: USA: Image Entertain in talks to buy Essex unit.
newsitem.headline: Image Entertain in talks to buy Essex unit.

text.p: Image Entertainment Inc said Monday it is in negotiations to acquire Essex Entertainment Inc's music business.
Image said that if a definitive agreement is reached, it expects the deal to close by the end of the year.

It would be financed primarily with the proceeds of a five-year convertible subordinated loan from Image Investors Co, a principal stockholder of Image owned and controlled by John Kluge and Stuart Subotnick.
If the acquisition is consummated, Essex's current principal executive officers, Sam Goff and Richard Greener, will head a new Image subsidiary that will conduct the business acquired from Essex.
Image is the largest licensee and distributor of laserdiscs in the United States. Essex is an independent music company.
